positions.subtitle: Business Club, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: B-Club, IIT Kharagpur, is a non-profit organization aiming to familiarize its members, with the technicalities of analytics, finance and consultancy. We strive to enhance our knowledge through in-house sessions, presentations, hands-on workshops and discussions. Matters deliberated vary from practical problems to hypothetical ones. The club serves as an excellent interface among students, professionals, faculty and alumni and develops the members into creative thinkers and strategists much before they step into the big world of business.
